title: Quality Assurance of Emergency Management Operation Processes through Statistical Process Control
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Quality Assurance of Emergency Management Operation Processes through Statistical Process Control Text Size: Quality Assurance of Emergency Management Operation Processes through Statistical Process Control http://www.ugpti.org/resources/reports/downloads/dp-283.pdf 173152 Quality Assurance of Emergency Management Operation Processes through Statistical Process Control The Upper Great Plains Transportation Institute has released a report that discusses how ambulance services are striving to improve their emergency response operations by using three phases of statistical process control to determine the current performance of emergency response.   9/10/2015
